alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Kingfisher; Logan (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 5:01PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Kingfisher, northwestern Logan and southwestern Garfield Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 500 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Waukomis to 3 miles southeast of Bison to near Lovell. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Enid, Hennessey, Waukomis, Drummond, Marshall, Lovell, Vance Air Force Base, and Bison. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
